code: outvcf <- file.path(paste0(tempfile(), ".vcf.gz")) bw <- vcfwriter$new(outvcf, "VCF4.1") bw$addContig("chr20") bw$addFORMAT("GT", "1", "String", "Genotype"); bw$addSample("NA12878") s1 <- "chr20\t2006060\t.\tG\tC\t100\tPASS\t.\tGT\t1|0" bw$writeline(s1) bw$close()
